page.title: 18Recreation in Twyford Area
page.content: Children play cricket and football in the Recreation Ground which also has swings,slides and a roundabout in one corner.They also go fishing,swimming and boating(homemade) in the local river.A very small proportion of the local children have their own horse,whereas all children have their own bicycle and use them a lot locally and for rides out with their family.Adults play cricket and football too,but also into their recreation comes things to do with the home and family;car/home maintenance and gardening.As a family people have day trips out in their car or by coach.The majority of people go on holiday at least once a year in this country or abroad.A wide range of hobbies are pursued:bell-ringing, bee- keeping,music,restoring clocks and watches,stamp collecting and taxidermy
